description:
Special Equipment for Xander. 
Gain a unique Skill.
name: Omnath, Locus of Mana

description:
Special Equipment for Leonard. 
Reduces MP Costs of Instants, gain Court of Cunning as Passive.
name: Grand Arbiter Augustin IV

description:
Special Equipment for Oren. 
Using Fracture or Vanishing Verse now only consumes one point of Dread Sniper. Starts with an extra Dread Sniper point.
name: Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher

description:
Special Equipment for Theodore.
Increase Phantom Knife generation by 1, gain Trick: Tendrils of Agony.
name: Volo, Guide to Monsters

description:
Special Equipment for Beeno.
On 50% HP, gain 2 TP Regeneration and +1 damage.
name: Juri, Master of the Revue

description:
A larger container for die for more experienced players.
Contains 2 dies.
name: Dice Bag

description: A fancy box that can contain 4 die.
name: Dice Box
note:
<Augment Slots>
Dice
Dice
Dice
Dice
</Augment Slots>

description: A player's first die container. Contains 1 dice.
name: Dice Pouch

description: Start with 2 TP, gain TP when you deal damage to an enemy.
name: Mountain
note:

</Custom On Equip Eval>

<Custom On Remove Equip Eval>

</Custom On Remove Equip Eval>
